titleStmt.title: A counterpoison against couetousnes in a sermon preached at Pauls-Crosse, May 23. 1619. By Ier. Dyke minister of Gods word at Epping in Essex.
titleStmt.author: Dyke, Jeremiah, 1584-1639.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed [by Richard Field] for Robert Mylbourne, and are to be sold at his shop at the great south doore of Pauls,

notesStmt.note: Running title reads: A counterpoyson against couetousnesse.
Some print show-through; some leaves cropped at head.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
